issue.title: Take into account the GeoExt and GXP upgrade in 4.2
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

The Gext and GXP libraries has been upgraded but it is not taken into account in 4.2.

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.7

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

I guess that it is an enhancement and not a bug ;-)
